long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The all new MozBar V4 from Moz!

Update: October 29, 2024

Community Users get access to Domain Authority and Page Authority - up to 1,000 calls per month.
Moz Pro Users: Access to all metrics & additional features from Moz Pro, including Spam Score


The all-in-one SEO toolbar for research on the go.
- *NEW* Popup extension complements the metrics bar (MozBar) SEOs have used for years.
- Rebuilt dark mode and Moz Pro navigation mode offer greater flexibility and accessibility.
- Quickly assess the Page Authority and Domain Authority of any site or page.
- *NEW* to MozBar V4: Brand Authority, Moz’s exclusive metric that measures a brand’s strength and influence, is available to all MozBar Premium users
- Find and highlight keywords on a page and differentiate links by type: Followed, No-Followed, External, or Internal.
- Rebuilt Page Analysis provides all the on-page elements you’ve come to love with MozBar and the new ability to identify hreflang tags, robots.txt, and sitemap URLs.
- *NEW* identify and copy schema markup on web pages for a simpler auditing process.
- *NEW* tap into your Moz Pro keyword queries to get a snapshot of a website’s top-ranking keywords.
- Access and compare link metrics across pages while viewing any SERP.
- Export your search engine results page (SERP) analysis details to a CSV file.
- Get instant page optimization details and know which factors are impacting a page’s ability to rank.

4.1.0 Updates:
- Brought DA mode back -- enabled by default, can disable it in the Settings tab
- Brought "Log in with Moz Pro" function back
- Fixed issue with Spain missing from Search Profile dropdown menu
- Data update with SERP Overlay function

4.0.9 Updates:
- Updated Quotas language on MozBar for Community and Pro users
- Removed Blank Meta Description Column (we decided not to pull that due to issues pulling it w/ - - - Show Remaining Quota on MozBar
- Blocklist language update
- Highlight Links - fix implemented to nofollow function
- Accept all types of email addresses on login function
- Fixed issue related Mozbar- seated users not able to use main account's quota

4.0.8 Updates:
- Added Spam Score to Link Metrics tab
- After logging in, settings tab opens up
- Resolved issue where DA & PA did not show on new URLs
- Added ability to click on Helpful and Hurting scores to access the respective tabs
- Added link on Home tab to MozBar Feature Access Levels
